name: Vaelum
description:
Vaelum is a rhythm game that offers a new gameplay alternative to the genre, in which the player must balance precision, timing and information processing.

 The gameplay consists of clicking on notes around the screen to the rhythm of a song,  but the player must be highlighting the correct colour to hit the note.  

Vaelum  also offers a performance ranking system, ranging from ‘Bronze’ to ‘Vaelescent’ as well as a myriad of alternate gamemodes.

Controls:

QWE - Change note colour

Space - Hit stars

Click - Hit notes

Esc - Pause/Quit
